Class House

java.lang.Object
House
Direct Known Subclasses:
SmallApartment
public class House extends Object
Represents a house. The house has an area and a door.
See Also:
  • Door

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    area
    The square footage of this house.
    private final Door
    door
    The door of this house.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    House()
    Creates a new House object with a default area of 1500 square feet.
    House(int area)
    Creates a new House object with custom area.

  • Field Details

    • area

      private int area
      The square footage of this house.

    • door

      private final Door door
      The door of this house.

  • Constructor Details

    • House

      public House()
      Creates a new House object with a default area of 1500 square feet. Initializes Door object with default settings.

    • House

      public House(int area)
      Creates a new House object with custom area. Sets the area of House object to specified value. Initializes Door object with default settings.
      Parameters:
      area - The desired area of the house in square feet. Must be non-negative.

  • Method Details

    • setArea

      public void setArea(int area)
      Sets area of the house to the specified value.
      Parameters:
      area - The desired area of the house in square feet. Must be non-negative.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided area is negative.

    • setDoor

      public void setDoor(String color)
      Sets color of the door to the specified value.
      Parameters:
      color - The desired color of the door.

    • getArea

      public int getArea()
      Retrieves the area of the house in square feet.
      Returns:
      The area of the house.

    • getDoor

      public Door getDoor()
      Retrieves the door of the house.
      Returns:
      The Door object associated with the house.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the house, including its area.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string in the format: "I am a house, my area is [area] square feet."
